name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba: The Hinokami Chronicles
overview: Relive memorable moments from the Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba anime through the eyes of its protagonist, Tanjiro Kamado! Follow the story from Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Tanjiro Kamado, Unwavering Resolve Arc—where Tanjiro joins the Demon Slayer Corps— to Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Movie: Mugen Train featuring the Flame Hashira, Kyojuro Rengoku! Face off against demons from the anime series with stunning graphical effects faithfully recreating iconic battle techniques in full 3D! Choose from a cast of 24 fighters, including not only protagonists like Tanjiro Kamado and Nezuko Kamado, but demons like Rui (Lower Five of the Twelve Kizuki) and Akaza (Upper Three of the Twelve Kizuki). Pit your favorite characters against each other and enjoy never-before-seen matchups! [Included in this Download] ・ Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles Game ・ Character Unlock Key: Kimetsu Academy Tanjiro Kamado The following items are included in the game from the beginning as a bonus for the Nintendo Switch™ version. ・ Kimetsu Points (16,000 Points) ・ In-game Costumes: ・ Butterfly Mansion Patient Wear (Tanjiro Kamado, Zenitsu Agatsuma, and Inosuke Hashibira) ・ Kimetsu Academy Summer Uniform Costumes (Kimetsu Academy Tanjiro Kamado, Kimetsu Academy Nezuko Kamado, Kimetsu Academy Zenitsu Agatsuma, Kimetsu Academy Inosuke Hashibira, Kimetsu Academy Giyu Tomioka)
